name: DocPlugin
author: Edgar Arroyo
desc: This plugin is summoned when you type wh and  a the programming language ypu want to get information of, DocPlugin helps you while programming returning info about certain features of a programming lang .
features: 'darya wh py3 for' retuns info about the for in python3
'darya wh py3 if' retuns info about the if statement in python3
'darya wh py3 range' retuns info about the range feature in python3
